title: Trump to impose $100k fee for H-1B worker visas, White House says
author: mriguy
aiHeadline: Trump's latest genius idea: Charge $100k for H-1B visas because, hey, why not make hiring smart people even more expensive?

title: Help us raise $200k to free JavaScript from Oracle
author: kaladin-jasnah
aiHeadline: JavaScript is in trouble again—this time, it's being held hostage by Oracle, and we need your money to save it. Because clearly, JavaScript can't save itself.

title: Ruby Central's Attack on RubyGems [pdf]
author: jolux
aiHeadline: Ruby Central is declaring war on RubyGems in the most dramatic way possible, complete with a PDF. Because who doesn't love a good tech industry drama?

title: I regret building this $3000 Pi AI cluster
author: speckx
aiHeadline: Building a $3000 Pi AI cluster was a terrible idea, and now the regret is setting in. Because who needs an expensive pile of Raspberry Pis, anyway?

title: Ants that seem to defy biology – They lay eggs that hatch into another species
author: sampo
aiHeadline: Ants are breaking all the rules of biology by laying eggs that hatch into a completely different species. Because apparently, some ants are just rebels without a cause.
